messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

block november critical hi guys keep receiving type regards november critical hi seen inviting run protection tool essential report effectiveness protection take protection assessment dashboard re re probably looking ways strengthen protection takes minutes multi choice questions effort benefits gain please let how assessment hear back kind regards critical hi re probably busy spare minutes exclusive tool important understand how benefit mapped dashboard analysis provided report critical which takes questions minutes complete helping protect future find out more about report completely free charge opportunity gain detailed without expense more than talk further worth while run discuss advise results kind regards keep informed about offers information well third parties think find useful receive information

message.reasoning:
